survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on consumer preferences and experiences with electric vehicle (EV) charging stations, including usage patterns, satisfaction levels, and desired features.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover the full range of usage frequencies. Consider adding a follow-up question for 'Never' responses to understand barriers to usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with a limit of 3 selections to prioritize top factors. This helps identify key decision drivers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice) with a maximum of 3 selections allowed.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Include a 'Not Applicable' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if the respondent selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying unmet needs.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
